alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 12:29PM MST until January 03 at 7:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Mexico, Southwest Desert/Mimbres Basin, Southern Dona Ana County/Mesilla Valley and Southern Tularosa Basin Counties. In Texas, Western El Paso County and Eastern/Central El Paso County Counties. * WHEN...Now until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
